title: Highly selective catalytic oxidation of methane to methanol using Cu–Pd/anatase
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02671C, Paper
Liqun Wang, Jingting Jin, Wenzhi Li, Cunshuo Li, Leyu Zhu, Zheng Zhou, Lulu Zhang, Xia Zhang, Liang Yuan
Cu–Pd/anatase is highly efficient in converting methane to methanol, exhibiting a relatively high methanol yield rate of ∼31 800 μmol gcat−1 h−1 and near-exclusive selectivity of liquid products (methanol).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
